entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
